He was known for his role on Hell Drivers (1957) and for his role as Doc Morrissey in the BBC sitcom The Fall and Rise of Reginald Perrin.http://www.leonardrossiter.com/reginaldperrin/BiogsMain.html John Horsley at Leonard Rossiter.com. retrieved 1 January 2012 Horsley died on 12 January 2014 from natural causes. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1920 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Actors from Essex Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors
